duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop high-quality applications and design/testable scalable code for Finance applications.
Provide expertise in Oracle EBS Finance and solution design for optimized Finance applications.
Collaborate with business to gather requirements for Oracle modules including General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Cash Management, etc.
Work independently, manage multiple task assignments, and exercise mature judgment in handling business in Finance Accounting and Financial Reporting.
Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 5 years IT Business Analyst experience working with Oracle ERP and Oracle Cloud, Bachelor's degree in IT related field (Master's preferred).
